ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] GZ answers some bard questions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... We do have a *skill* for summoning food and drink however. Giving us this is like like giving a warrior a piece with Effect: Taunt and another with Effect:
ygData.messageBody:
> -----Original Message-----
> From: JasonF [mailto:jasonf@...]

>
> Warrior Greaves cast Invisibility. That's cool, but we have a
> song for that
> guys. Think about it, we *don't* have songs that can summon food
> and drink.
> I think it's kinda nifty, but I will admit that I hope the BP casts Gate.
> :)
>

We do have a *skill* for summoning food and drink however.

Giving us this is like like giving a warrior a piece with Effect: Taunt and
another with Effect: Bash. It really doesn't make much sense.

Also in answer to the whole AC thing. I'm not so concerned about our AC
compared to other things we can wear. I'm concerned about our AC compared
to classes that are restricted from wearing plate. There is no way under
that model that Rogue and Ranger armor should have the same AC as Bard
armor. I agree it doesn't have to be as high as Warriors, but it should be
higher than chain. I suspect that the Clerics are in the same boat here
though I haven't paid any attention to their armor stats...

Anthem Dirgemaker
Level 52 Minstrel of Qeynos
Solusek Ro
